Extension and International Programs



Extension and International Programs
Online degrees, certificate programs, and accelerated courses at California State
                                 University, Fullerton. Your growth is our goal.






Professional Development



Professional Development
Certificate programs provide working professionals with evening and weekend courses,
                                 as well as networking opportunities to advance their careers or enter new fields.


 Certificate Programs  Educator Courses and Programs Community & Corporate Engagement Leadership for Public Agencies



Degrees



Degrees
EIP partners with CSUF colleges and departments to offer bachelor’s and master’s degrees,
                                 as well as preparation programs for those looking to apply to professional health-care,
                                 law and business schools.


 Online Degree Completion Programs  Master’s Programs  Pre-Health Program  Test Preparation Courses 



University Courses



University Courses
EIP expands access to University classes through Open University, Summer Session and
                                    Winter Session. Open University registration is open to the general public; Summer
                                    and Winter Sessions help Cal State Fullerton students graduate on-time or early.


 Open University  Summer Session  Winter Session 



Lifelong Learning



Lifelong Learning
Our lifelong learning opportunities range from programs for children to retirees,
                                 and include an on-campus arboretum  with classes and events for those of all ages.


 Fullerton Arboretum  Osher Lifelong Learning Institute 



Online



Online Programs
Online programs are structured with lectures and assignments, and allow you to interact
                                 and communicate with students and instructors/professors online.


 Online Certificate Programs  Online Degree Completion Programs  Online Programs for EducatorsOnline Training & Courses



International



International Programs
International students may study for one semester or complete an entire bachelor's
                                 or master's degree at CSUF. 


 International Programs  International Admissions  University Semester Abroad International Students & ScholarsStudy Abroad & Global Engagement

YOUR EDUCATION YOUR CAREER YOUR SCHEDULE
Online degrees, certificate programs, and accelerated courses at California State
                                          University, Fullerton. Your growth is our goal.





Book an Event at Fullerton Arboretum
Book an Event ►





Professional Development

BA in Sociology
Finish Your Degree Anytime, Anywhere! ►





Open University

Online Programs
Learn From Home ►








Online courses: get started, learn anywhere



At home, at work, on the road … our classroom is wherever you are. Online courses
                                    give you the flexibility to update your skills, advance your career or just learn
                                    something new — on your schedule.
Certificate Programs Starting This FallHands-on instruction from experienced professionals expands your skillset and provides
                                    the tools for immediate improvement.






Fiduciary Management








Skillstorm








Human Resources Management








Data Science & Data Analytics








Digital Marketing







  

 Geographic Information Systems




   
View All Online Programs








Advance your career with short-term certificate programs
We offer dozens of short-term educational opportunities, as well as customized solutions,
                                       to help you advance in your career or change professions. Our certificate programs
                                       are offered on weekends, evenings or online:
Certificate Programs Starting This FallHands-on instruction from experienced professionals expands your skillset and provides
                                       the tools for immediate improvement.






Level Up! Game-Based Learning Microcredential 








Project Management








Advanced Manufacturing Engineering









Lean Six Sigma Green Belt








Crime and Intelligence Analysis





   
View All Certificate Programs 











Earn your bachelor's or advanced degree
Extension and International Programs (EIP) partners with Cal State Fullerton colleges
                                    and departments to offer bachelor’s and master’s degrees, as well as preparation programs
                                    for those looking to apply to professional health-care, law and business schools.



Online BA Degree Completion
Online degree-completion programs are ideal for finishing your bachelor’s degree in
                                    a schedule that works for you.
Bachelor’s Programs     

Master's Programs
Convenient options – including evening/weekend classes and accelerated schedules –
                                    for those pursuing a master’s degree.
Master's Programs     

Pre-Health Postbaccalaureate Program 
Credits, classes and support to turn those with non-science bachelor's degrees into
                                    successful applicants to professional health-care programs.
Pre-Health Program     

Test Preparation Courses
Classes meet on weekends and include workshops for the GMAT, GRE and LSAT exams.
Test Preparation Courses     








Enroll in Cal State Fullerton courses
Extension and International Programs expands access to University classes through
                              Open University, Summer Session and Winter Session. Open University registration is
                              open to the general public; Summer and Winter Sessions help Cal State Fullerton students
                              graduate on-time or early.



Open University
Enrollment in Cal State Fullerton’s undergraduate and graduate classes is open to
                                          the public on a space-available basis.
Open University     






   
Summer Session     



   
Winter Session     





Non-Cal State Fullerton students looking to take classes during Summer or Winter Session
                                       should enroll through Open University.





Explore lifelong learning opportunities
Our lifelong learning opportunities range from programs for children to retirees,
                                 and include an on-campus arboretum with classes and events for those of all ages.


   

Titan Youth Programs     


Programs for children in STEM, technology, academics and other enriching learning
                                             experiences.




   

Fullerton Arboretum    


Our twenty-six acre Arboretum offers classes and activities to Cal State Fullerton
                                             students and the general public.




   

Osher Lifelong Learning Institute     


Classes and opportunities for active, older adults to join a learning community housed
                                             on a university campus.











Continue your education online
Many of our programs are offered online, allowing maximum flexibility for you to continue
                              your education.
Online Programs     













This site is maintained by Extension and International Programs.

Web Accessibility
CSUF is committed to ensuring equal accessibility to our users. Let us know about
            any accessibility problems you encounter using this website.We'll do our best to improve things and get you the information you need.
